endif()

iree_add_all_subdirs()

    check

    "collatz.mlir"
    "edge_detection.mlir"
    "fullyconnected.mlir"

    "stablehlo"

    simple_mul_llvm_cpu_static_bytecode_test

    simple_mul_dispatch_0

    "simple_mul"

)

  NAME
    simple_mul_llvm_cpu_static_c_test
